metadata.name: prev_frame_swf_4
metadata.description: Tests PREV_FRAME opcode (0x05) - moves playhead to previous frame. Test verifies prevFrame correctly navigates backwards in the timeline by using gotoFrame to jump forward, then prevFrame to go back.

test_details.test_structure: Frame 0: trace('Frame 1'), gotoFrame(2) -> Frame 2: trace('Frame 3'), prevFrame() -> Frame 1: trace('Frame 2'), stop()
validates: prevFrame moves to previous frame correctly
Frame navigation works in combination with gotoFrame
prevFrame does not affect play/pause state

notes: Implementation correctly handles edge case of prevFrame at frame 0 (does nothing), though not explicitly tested
